QuestData.Title: The Great Hat Robbery
QuestData.Description:
Along this road the merchants ride. Taking dere wares from one place to another and lining them own pockets.
One Big Mon named Tik'su be the worst of all. He charge arms and legs outright and it even take trolls some time to regrow them parts.
His biggest pride? His hat.
Go be my messenger, Rich-mon. Scare his burdened beast and knock off Tik'su. Then bring me his hat.
QuestData.LogDescription:
Successfully steal Tik'su's Hat.
If you lose your saurid disguise, return to Jani for another.
